name: Nodosaurus
description: The Nodosaurus is a large, unaligned beast that thrives in swampy environments, featuring a massive tail used for powerful strikes.
memorable: It excels at stealth in swampy terrain, making it a dangerous ambush predator.
goals: To blend into its environment and ambush prey.
relations: May be encountered alongside other swamp-dwelling beasts.
strengths: Highly capable in melee with abundant bludgeoning damage and adept at stealth in its habitat.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma scores limit strategy and interaction.
attacks: Employs a tail attack, delivering significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Swamp Camouflage, granting advantage on stealth checks in swampy terrain.
senses: Passive Perception of 11 allows it to notice average details in its environment.
additional_information: Strong and durable with a Constitution of 14.
Average Dexterity does not impact agility significantly.
Low Intelligence restricts understanding of complex concepts.
Very low Charisma makes it ineffective in social situations.
Ability to deliver 12 bludgeoning damage with its tail attack.
test_queries: large swamp predator with a powerful tail
stealthy creature that hides in swamps
